org.jeo.data

Class Cursor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jeo.data.Cursor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureCursor, TileCursor

    public abstract class Cursor<T>
extends Object
implements Closeable, Iterable<T>
    An iterator like object used to read contents of Dataset objects.

    Example usage: 

      Cursor
